subject: Re: [junit] need help in installing JUnit ;New in using Junit
msgSnippet: ... Google JUnit guide . The tutorial JUnit: A Starter Guide includes detailed instructions on getting JUnit working with the right class path. Good luck.
messageBody:
hari31582 wrote:
> hi All
>
> I am Harish , just now i joined this group. I have to use junit for
> testing java product. I try to installed but still it isnot working.
> would anyone help me for installation.

Google "JUnit guide". The tutorial "JUnit: A Starter Guide" includes
detailed instructions on getting JUnit working with the right class path.

Good luck.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
